raw_text: The balcony is on the south side of the apartment next to the living room. It is 12' x 5'. The bathroom is on the north side of the apartment next to the kitchen. It is 10' x 7'. The first common room is on the center of the apartment next to the master room. It is 10' x 8'. The second common room is on the north east side of the apartment next to the bathroom. It is 12' x 15'. The kitchen is on the north west side of the apartment next to the bathroom. It is 10' x 7'. The living room is on the west side of the apartment next to the bathroom. It is 30' x 25'. The master room is on the south east side of the apartment next to the first common room. It is 12' x 15'.
